typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		full_path as string,
		last_modified as timestamp,
		last_modified_iso as string,
		last_modified_timestamp as double,
		name as long,
		size as string,
		type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	documentForm: 'arrayOfDocuments') ~> AzureBlobStorageSecFilings
AzureBlobStorageSecFilings derive(each(match(name=='name'), $$ = toString($$))) ~> ChangeNameColumnToString
RemoveSizeColumn select(mapColumn(
		each(match(name!='last_modified_iso'&&name!='last_modified_timestamp'&&name!='size'))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveLastModifiedColumns
RemoveLastModifiedColumns derive(cik = split(full_path, '/')[7],
		type = iif(type=="folder.gif",'folder', 'null')) ~> CreateOtherColumns
ChangeNameColumnToString select(mapColumn(
		full_path,
		last_modified,
		last_modified_iso,
		last_modified_timestamp,
		name,
		type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveSizeColumn
CreateOtherColumns derive(full_path = lower(full_path)) ~> ModifyColumns1
